::Kaiser::
       "You're quite right, I had forgotten."  He thinks to himself for a 
moment, calming down considerably.  "However, I think that particular skill 
would best be used after the battle, thus sowing further confusion and 
dissension.  That is, of course, only if you can control it enough so as to 
not be overwhelming.  A subtle paranoia will do quite nicely without them 
noticing anything is wrong."

--part1_1e8.9011f1a.2bf5a674_boundary
